  +
'''Herrmann & Kleine''' was a [[plinkerpop]] duo that formed circa [[1997]] and featured [[Christian Kleine]] and [[City Centre Offices]] label manager, [[Thaddi Herrmann]]. In addition to releasing a pair of [[EP]] recordings, the duo also provided remixes to tracks by various notable bands, including [[His Name Is Alive]] and [[Bomb the Bass]]. They also shared stages with the likes of [[Lali Puna]].
'''Herrmann & Kleine''' was a [[plinkerpop]] duo that formed circa [[1997]] and featured [[Christian Kleine]] and [[City Centre Offices]] label manager, [[Thaddi Herrmann]]. In addition to releasing a pair of [[EP]] recordings, the duo also provided remixes to tracks by various notable bands, including [[His Name Is Alive]] and [[Bomb the Bass]]. They also shared stages with the likes of [[Lali Puna]].
Their sole full-length recording ''Our Noise'' saw release on [[April 2]] [[2002]] via the [[Morr Music]] label.
Their sole full-length recording ''Our Noise'' saw release on [[April 2]] [[2002]] via the [[Morr Music]] label.
